description: Set builder base league roles.

name: autorole clan-roles
description: Manage automatic role management for clan roles.

options.name: clans
options.description: Clan tags or aliases to filter clans.

options.name: everyone_role
options.description: Clan role for everyone in the clan.

options.name: only_verified
options.description: Roles will be given to the verified players only. (API token verification is required)

name: autorole config
description: Manage automatic roles settings.

options.name: role_removal_delays
options.description: Whether to delay the removal of roles.

options.name: role_addition_delays
options.description: Whether to delay the addition of roles.

options.name: delay_exclusion_roles
options.description: Roles that are excluded from delays.

options.name: always_force_refresh_roles
options.description: Whether to enforce role refresh for individual users by default.

options.name: allow_not_linked
options.description: Whether to allow not linked players to get roles.

options.name: verified_only_clan_roles
options.description: Whether to grant clans roles to verified players only.

name: autorole disable
description: Disable automatic clan roles.
description_long: Disable automatic role management for clan roles, town hall levels, or leagues.

options.name: clans
options.description: Clan tags or aliases to filter clans.

name: autorole family
description: Set family roles.

options.name: exclusive_family_role
options.description: Exclusive family role (all linked accounts are in the family)

options.name: account_linked_role
options.description: Account linked role (account linked but may not be verified)

name: autorole leagues
description: Manage automatic role management for leagues.

options.name: allow_non_family_accounts
options.description: Whether to give roles to the members that are not in the family clans.

name: autorole list
description: List all auto roles and settings.

name: autorole refresh
description: Refresh roles manually.
description_long: Refresh roles manually. (Use this command if the roles are not updated automatically)

options.name: user_or_role
options.description: Refresh an individual user or a role.

options.name: is_test_run
options.description: Test run to see the changes without applying.

options.name: force_refresh
options.description: Whether to bypass delays and force refresh roles.

description: Manage automatic role management for town hall levels.

options.name: allow_non_family_accounts
options.description: Whether to give roles to the members that are not in the family clans.
